summary: Started implementing Gemini's architecture recommendations. Completed Phase 1.1: Moved User model to app/Domains/Auth/Models/User.php and Category model to app/Domains/Core/Models/Category.php. Updated all references across the codebase (15+ files including Models, Policies, Controllers, Filament Resources, Seeders, Factories). Deleted old model files. Started Phase 1.2: Created 3 Action classes following Single Responsibility Principle: EnrollUserAction, AddProductToCartAction, CreateOrderFromCartAction. No linting errors. Configuration cache cleared.
current_status: Phase 1.1 (Models Migration) completed 100%. Phase 1.2 (Actions) in progress - 3 of 6 actions created. Next steps: Complete remaining actions, install spatie/laravel-data for DTOs, create Form Requests, and refactor Controllers to use Actions and DTOs. Architecture refactoring progressing well according to world-class standards recommended by Gemini.
